com.google.android.agera

Class BaseObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.agera.BaseObservable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public abstract class BaseObservable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    A partial implementation of Observable that adheres to the threading contract between Observables and Updatables. Subclasses can use observableActivated() and observableDeactivated() to control the activation and deactivation of this observable, and to send out notifications to client updatables with dispatchUpdate().

    For cases where subclassing BaseObservable is impossible, for example when the potential class already has a base class, consider using Observables.updateDispatcher() to help implement the Observable interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected BaseObservable() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUpdatable(Updatable updatable)
      Adds updatable to the Observable.
      protected void dispatchUpdate()
      Notifies all registered Updatables.
      protected void observableActivated()
      Called from the worker looper thread when this Observable is activated by transitioning from having no client Updatables to having at least one client Updatable.
      protected void observableDeactivated()
      Called from the worker looper thread when this Observable is deactivated by transitioning from having at least one client Updatable to having no client Updatables.
      void removeUpdatable(Updatable updatable)
      Removes updatable from the Observable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
